PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.United States: country where the defendant attempted to re-enter
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.United States Probation Officer: official who received the defendant's statement
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Mexico: country to which the defendant was previously deported
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Rio Grande: river crossed by the defendant to enter the United States
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Laredo: city in Texas where the defendant's family resides
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Texas: state in the United States where the defendant re-entered
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.PSR: report that documented the defendant's statement and background
